Title: Duplicate Advisory: Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2025-55247 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability
Description:
### Duplicate Advisory
This advisory has been withdrawn because it is a duplicate of GHSA-w3q9-fxm7-j8fq. This link is maintained to preserve external references.

### Original Description
Improper link resolution before file access ('link following') in .NET allows an authorized attacker to elevate privileges locally.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 17.15.0-preview-25277-114 before 18.0.0-preview-25476-107, version 17.15.0-preview-25277-114
